ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 111 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 111 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: You definitely have to do more work to write your thesis in as a separate credit than you would just writing it in a seminar. The page requirement is much longer. Just something to consider, I'm very happy with how mine came out and I needed the credit anyway!
I mean you have to do a senior essay at some point...
I recommend ANTH 491 to Anthro majors who have an independent research proposal and study designed. This one-on-one mentorship is great guidance for research especially if it is your first time.
Your thesis will never be the final product you want it to be, but its an excellent expedition into academia and knowledge production.
